messages.subject: Merry Christmas from Katamori-sama
messages.msgSnippet: In Humor (under Photos ). He s saying Christmas...could it be KYUU RI ga arimaSU? (bad attempt at a Japanese pun). Plus, the Ai on the Aizu flag has a
messages.messageBody:
In "Humor" (under "Photos"). He's saying "Christmas...could it be
'KYUU RI ga arimaSU?" (bad attempt at a Japanese pun).

Plus, the "Ai" on the Aizu flag has a Christmas tree star on top
(since it kinda looks like a Christmas tree).

Happy holidays everyone!!

--M.
